body: . Subtract half the MR from the final CR to get the initial CR. If the final CR is 7 and the MR is 2, half of 2 is 1, so the initial CR is 7 – 1 = 6.
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Building a Mythic Creature/Create a New Monster/Step 3-Determine its initial CR
name: Step 3-Determine its initial CR
